posts.title: The Importance of CMS and Retainers for Site Management
posts.excerpt: Learn why a CMS and ongoing site management retainers are essential for maintaining a strong online presence.
posts.content: Having a Content Management System (CMS) allows you to easily update and manage your website without needing to rely on a developer for every change. Coupling your CMS with a retainer plan ensures your website stays secure, up-to-date, and optimized for performance. Learn how ongoing management can prevent downtime, enhance SEO, and keep your website aligned with evolving business goals.
